description: Variation of Conditions 1, 4 and 5 of planning permission dated 31st August 2021 (RN:21/00759/FULL) for the Demolition and redevelopment of an existing single family dwelling behind a retained and altered facade including a new second floor mansard roof extension namely, to amend the design of the garage doors to include a painted timber ventilation louvre panel and to approve all facing materials.
